attributes.action: Privatise the British Government and request the Dutch Government to run the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recently published Unicef report stated that we have the lowest ranked position for children's well being across 21 economically advanced countries. In light of the fact the Government policies appear to be failing to provide adequate social,educational and welfare provision for children, I suggest that the British Goverment is privatised and that the Dutch Government(Netherlands came top in the Unicef study) are asked to run Britain in order to improve social, educational and welfare standards for children and future generations.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
